Games.name: Games
Games.description: Playable games to test your skills, memory, and luck.

apps.title: Logic Architect
apps.description: Construct digital circuits using logic gates and neural pathways.

apps.title: FezType (Typing Speed Tester)
apps.description: Test and improve your typing speed.

apps.title: BPM Guesser
apps.description: Tap the beat to guess the BPM of a song.

apps.title: Code Seance
apps.description: Communicate with the ghosts of deprecated code in this haunted terminal.

apps.title: Mastermind
apps.description: Play the classic code-breaking game of Mastermind (Bulls and Cows).

apps.title: Nonogram
apps.description: Solve picture logic puzzles by filling cells according to numerical clues.

apps.title: Higher or Lower Card Game
apps.description: Guess if the next card will be higher or lower than the current one.

apps.title: Soccer Pong
apps.description: A Pong-style game with a soccer twist. Player vs. AI.

apps.title: Memory Game
apps.description: Test your memory by matching pairs of cards.

apps.title: Rock Paper Scissors
apps.description: Play the classic game of Rock Paper Scissors against the computer.

apps.title: Tic Tac Toe
apps.description: Play the classic game of Tic Tac Toe against another player or AI.

apps.title: Connect Four
apps.description: Play the classic game of Connect Four against another player or AI.

apps.title: Word Ladder
apps.description: Transform one word into another by changing one letter at a time.

apps.title: Lights Out
apps.description: A classic logic puzzle where you turn off all the lights.

apps.title: Whack-a-Bug
apps.description: Test your reflexes by fixing bugs as fast as you can!

apps.title: Simon Says
apps.description: Test your memory by repeating the sequence of lights.

apps.title: Alchemy Lab
apps.description: Combine elements and discover the secrets of the digital universe.

apps.title: Roguelike Adventure
apps.description: A simple terminal-like roguelike game.

apps.title: Souls Banner Generator

apps.title: Sprite Editor

apps.title: Rotary Phone
apps.description: A digital rotary phone. Dial numbers with your mouse or finger.

apps.title: Voyager Terminal

apps.title: Paper & Ink

apps.title: Cozy Corner

apps.description: Roll various types of dice for your games and adventures.
